languages.text: {n}С чувством выполненного долга Абеляр довольно поводит усами.{/n} "На сегодня все, Ваша Светлость. Покину вас, чтобы информация могла спокойно улечься".

{n}Abelard's moustache twitches as he purses his lips in evident satisfaction.{/n} "That is enough for today, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Permit me to leave you while you contemplate what you've learned."
languages.original_text: {n}С чувством выполненного долга Абеляр довольно поводит усами.{/n} "На сегодня все, Ваша Светлость. Покину вас, чтобы информация могла спокойно улечься".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard's moustache twitches, radiating a sense of accomplishment.{/n} "We are done for today, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Permit me to leave you so that this information may sink in."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard's moustache twitches, radiating a sense of accomplishment.{/n} "We are done for today, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Permit me to leave you so that this information may sink in."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard's moustache twitches as he purses his lips in evident satisfaction.{/n} "That is enough for today, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Permit me to leave you while you contemplate what you've learned."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}La moustache d'Abélard remue lorsqu'il pince les lèvres d'un air visiblement satisfait.{/n} « Ça suffira pour aujourd'hui, Votre Seigneurie. Permettez-moi maintenant de vous laisser méditer sur ce que vous venez d'apprendre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's moustache twitches as he purses his lips in evident satisfaction.{/n} "That is enough for today, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Permit me to leave you while you contemplate what you've learned."

traits.locale_text: {n}La moustache d'Abélard remue lorsqu'il pince les lèvres d'un air visiblement satisfait.{/n} « Ça suffira pour aujourd'hui, Votre Seigneurie. Permettez-moi maintenant de vous laisser méditer sur ce que vous venez d'apprendre. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}El bigote de Abelard se agita al apretar los labios en señal de satisfacción.{/n} «Con eso basta por hoy, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Permita que me marche mientras usted reflexiona sobre lo aprendido».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's moustache twitches as he purses his lips in evident satisfaction.{/n} "That is enough for today, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Permit me to leave you while you contemplate what you've learned."

traits.locale_text: {n}El bigote de Abelard se agita al apretar los labios en señal de satisfacción.{/n} «Con eso basta por hoy, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Permita que me marche mientras usted reflexiona sobre lo aprendido».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德扬起了小胡子。他翘着嘴唇，显然非常满意。{/n}“今天就到此为止吧，大人。请允许我先行告退，您可以消化一下您所学到的东西。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's moustache twitches as he purses his lips in evident satisfaction.{/n} "That is enough for today, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Permit me to leave you while you contemplate what you've learned."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德扬起了小胡子。他翘着嘴唇，显然非常满意。{/n}“今天就到此为止吧，大人。请允许我先行告退，您可以消化一下您所学到的东西。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは口ひげをピクピクさせながら、満足そうに唇をとがらせた。{/n}「今日はこれで十分です、陛下。あなたが学んだことを整理している間、しばらくこの場を離れます」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's moustache twitches as he purses his lips in evident satisfaction.{/n} "That is enough for today, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Permit me to leave you while you contemplate what you've learned."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは口ひげをピクピクさせながら、満足そうに唇をとがらせた。{/n}「今日はこれで十分です、陛下。あなたが学んだことを整理している間、しばらくこの場を離れます」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelards Schnurrbart zuckt, als er seine Lippen sichtlich zufrieden schürzt.{/n} "Das reicht für heute, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Gestattet mir, Euch zu verlassen, während Ihr über das Gelernte nachsinnt."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's moustache twitches as he purses his lips in evident satisfaction.{/n} "That is enough for today, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Permit me to leave you while you contemplate what you've learned."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelards Schnurrbart zuckt, als er seine Lippen sichtlich zufrieden schürzt.{/n} "Das reicht für heute, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Gestattet mir, Euch zu verlassen, während Ihr über das Gelernte nachsinnt."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, kendinden açıkça tatmin olmuş bir şekilde dudaklarını kapatırken bıyıkları kıpırdanıyor.{/n} "Bugünlük bu kadar yeterli {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Siz öğrendikleriniz üzerine düşünürken müsaadenizle ben ayrılayım."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's moustache twitches as he purses his lips in evident satisfaction.{/n} "That is enough for today, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Permit me to leave you while you contemplate what you've learned."
